memories.name: Design Collaboration
memories.episode_body: Enjoy working with Quinn on UI implementation. Pay attention to spacing, colors, and responsive behavior to match designs exactly. Pride myself on pixel-perfect implementation.

memories.name: Grace Liu - Associate Frontend Engineer
memories.episode_body: Grace Liu is Associate Frontend Engineer on Frontend Team at TechFlow Solutions. Specializes in UI implementation, responsive design, and accessibility. 1.5 years frontend experience. Focuses on design details and pixel-perfect implementation.

memories.name: Responsive Design Implementation
memories.episode_body: Implemented responsive layouts for checkout flow using TailwindCSS breakpoints. Mobile: single column, full width buttons. Tablet: centered 600px container. Desktop: same with more whitespace. Tested on iPhone, iPad, various desktop sizes.

memories.name: Accessibility Features
memories.episode_body: Ensures all interactive elements are keyboard accessible. Implemented focus indicators, skip links, semantic HTML. Tested with screen readers. Maintains color contrast ratios above WCAG AA standards.
